attributes.action: Change legislation to ensure child sex abuse and child abuse leading to a childs death carries only one sentence - LIFE in prison until they die with no option of parole. This includes all those who own images or videos, are witness to, or carry out child sexual abuse and all individuals directly involved in the death of a child even if they did not inflict the "final blow"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
